trans-unit.source: List or clean libman cache contents
trans-unit.target: 列出或清除 libman 缓存内容

trans-unit.source: Deletes all library files defined in libman.json from the project
trans-unit.target: 从项目中删除 libman.json 中定义的所有库文件

trans-unit.source: Deletes any folders that become empty after this operation.
trans-unit.target: 删除在此操作后变为空的所有文件夹。

trans-unit.source: The path, relative to the current directory, where library files should be installed if no destination is defined for a given library.
trans-unit.target: 相对于当前目录的路径, 如果没有为给定的库定义目标, 则应在其中安装库文件。

trans-unit.source: The provider to use if no provider is defined for a given library. (eg. “cdnjs”, “filesystem”)
trans-unit.target: 未为给定库定义提供程序时要使用的提供程序。(例如 “cdnjs”、“filesystem”)

trans-unit.source: Location to install the library (if not specified, the default destination location will be used)
trans-unit.target: 安装库的位置 (如果未指定, 将使用默认目标位置)

trans-unit.source: Examples:
trans-unit.target: 示例:

trans-unit.source: The files from the specified library to install (if not specified, all files from the library will be installed)
trans-unit.target: 要安装的指定库中的文件 (如果未指定, 则将安装库中的所有文件)

trans-unit.source: Create a new libman.json
trans-unit.target: 创建新的 libman. json

trans-unit.source: Add a library definition to the libman.json file, and download the library to the specified location
trans-unit.target: 向 LibMan.json 文件添加库定义, 并将库下载到指定位置

trans-unit.source: libman install jquery@3.2.1 libman install jquery --provider cdnjs --destination wwwroot\scripts\jquery --files jquery.min.js libman install myCalendar --provider filesystem --files calendar.js --files calendar.css
trans-unit.target: libman install jquery@3.2.1 libman install jquery --provider cdnjs --destination wwwroot\scripts\jquery --files jquery.min.js libman install myCalendar --provider filesystem --files calendar.js --files calendar.css

trans-unit.source: Library to install
trans-unit.target: 要安装的库

trans-unit.source: CDNJS libraries have a library ID format of “<libraryName>@<libraryVersion>” For CDNJS libraries, if no version is specified in the library ID, the highest version available is used.
trans-unit.target: CDNJS 库的库 ID 格式为“<库名称>@<库版本>” 对于 CDNJS 库，如果库 ID 中没有指定版本，则使用最高可用版本。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a libman.json if one does not exist If no default provider exists, --provider option is required If no default destination exists, --destination option is required If no files are specified, the entire library is included
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在 libman.json 则初始化它 如果不存在默认提供程序，则需要 --provider 选项，如果不存在默认目标，则需要 --destination 选项 如果未指定文件，则包括整个库

trans-unit.source: Invalid arguments for command: {0}
trans-unit.target: 命令的参数无效: {0}

trans-unit.source: Library Manager
trans-unit.target: 库管理器

trans-unit.source: Provider to use (if not specified, the default provider will be used)
trans-unit.target: 要使用的提供程序 (如果未指定, 将使用默认提供程序)

trans-unit.source: Provider-specific logic:
trans-unit.target: 特定于提供程序的逻辑:

trans-unit.source: Remarks:
trans-unit.target: 言论:

trans-unit.source: Downloads all files from provider and saves them to specified destination
trans-unit.target: 从提供程序下载所有文件并将其保存到指定的目标

trans-unit.source: Error if no libman.json in current folder If a library specifies a provider, it will override the defaultProvider If a library specifies a destination, it will override the defaultDestination
trans-unit.target: 如果当前文件夹中不存在 libman.json 则出错 如果库指定提供程序，它将覆盖 defaultProvider 如果库指定目标，它将覆盖 defaultDestination

trans-unit.source: Deletes all files for the specified library from their specified destination, then removes the specified library definition from libman.json
trans-unit.target: 从指定的目标删除指定库的所有文件, 然后从 libman.json 删除指定的库定义

trans-unit.source: libman uninstall jquery libman uninstall jquery@3.3.1
trans-unit.target: libman uninstall jquery libman uninstall jquery@3.3.1

trans-unit.source: Library to uninstall
trans-unit.target: 要卸载的库

trans-unit.source: The provider of the library to be uninstalled
trans-unit.target: 要卸载的库的提供程序

trans-unit.source: CDNJS libraries have a library ID format of “<libraryName>@<libraryVersion>” If no version is specified in the library ID, this command will act on any library with libraryName matching the given libraryId
trans-unit.target: CDNJS 库的库 ID 格式为“<库名称>@<库版本>” 如果库 ID 中没有指定版本，此命令将作用于库名称与给定库 ID 匹配的任何库

trans-unit.source: Error if no libman.json in current folder Error if specified library doesn't exist If there's more than one library with the same libraryId, you'll be prompted to choose.
trans-unit.target: 若当前文件夹中不存在 libman.json 则出错 若指定的库不存在则出错 若有多个具有相同 libraryId 的库，则提示你进行选择。

trans-unit.source: Set the verbosity of output (eg. "normal", "detailed", "quiet")
trans-unit.target: 设置输出的详细程度(例如“正常”、“详细”、“安静”)

trans-unit.source: Path to the project (Current directory is used as default)
trans-unit.target: 项目的路径(默认使用当前目录)

trans-unit.source: Directory not found {0}
trans-unit.target: 找不到目录 {0}

trans-unit.source: Failed to restore "{0}"
trans-unit.target: 未能还原 "{0}"

trans-unit.source: {0} deleted
trans-unit.target: 已删除 {0}

trans-unit.source: Failed to delete {0}
trans-unit.target: 未能删除 {0}

trans-unit.source: {0} written to disk
trans-unit.target: {0} 写入磁盘

trans-unit.source: Failed to init: A 'libman.json' already exists
trans-unit.target: 初始化失败: "libman.json" 已存在

trans-unit.source: Failed to clean some files.
trans-unit.target: 无法清理某些文件。

trans-unit.source: libman.json was not found:{0}
trans-unit.target: 未找到 libman.json:{0}

trans-unit.source: Default destination is not set. Please provide a destination using '--destination'
trans-unit.target: 未设置默认目标。请使用 "--destination" 提供目标

trans-unit.source: LibraryId is required to install
trans-unit.target: 需要 LibraryId 才能安装

trans-unit.source: LibraryId is required to uninstall
trans-unit.target: 需要 LibraryId 才能卸载

trans-unit.source: More than one library found with id "{0}"
trans-unit.target: 发现多个 ID 为“{0}”的库

trans-unit.source: Default Provider is not set. Please provide a provider using '--provider'
trans-unit.target: 未设置默认提供程序。请用 "--provider" 提供提供程序

trans-unit.source: Use --provider to disambiguate libraries of same name from different providers in the project
trans-unit.target: 使用 --provider 消除项目中来自不同提供程序的同名库的歧义

trans-unit.source: More than one library found with id "{0}" for provider "{1}". Please remove the manually from the libman.json file
trans-unit.target: 为提供程序 "{1}" 找到 id 为 "{0}" 的多个库。请从 libman.json 文件中手动删除

trans-unit.source: Library "{0}" is not installed. Nothing to uninstall
trans-unit.target: 未安装库 "{0}"。没有可卸载的内容

trans-unit.source: Delete all files from the local machine's LibMan cache.
trans-unit.target: 从本地计算机的 LibMan 缓存中删除所有文件。

trans-unit.source: Display a list of all libraries that are stored in the local machine’s LibMan cache.
trans-unit.target: 显示存储在本地计算机的 LibMan 缓存中的所有库的列表。

trans-unit.source: Provider for which the cache files should be cleaned.
trans-unit.target: 要为其清除缓存文件的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Updates the specified library
trans-unit.target: 更新指定的库

trans-unit.source: libman update jquery libman update jquery --to 3.3.1 libman update jquery -pre
trans-unit.target: libman update jquery libman update jquery --to 3.3.1 libman update jquery -pre

trans-unit.source: Error if no libman.json in current folder Error if specified library doesn't exist If there's more than one library with the same libraryId, you'll be prompted to choose.
trans-unit.target: 若当前文件夹中不存在 libman.json 则出错 若指定的库不存在则出错 若有多个具有相同 libraryId 的库，则提示你进行选择。

trans-unit.source: Name of the library to update (without the version).
trans-unit.target: 要更新的库的名称 (不带版本)。

trans-unit.source: If specified, the latest pre-release version of the library will be downloaded (where applicable)
trans-unit.target: 如果指定, 将下载最新的库预发行版本 (如果适用)

trans-unit.source: If specified, only libraries from the specified provider will be updated
trans-unit.target: 如果指定, 则仅更新来自指定提供程序的库

trans-unit.source: Cache cleaned.
trans-unit.target: 已清理缓存。

trans-unit.source: Failed to clean cache: {0}
trans-unit.target: 无法清除缓存: {0}

trans-unit.source: Cache contents:
trans-unit.target: 缓存内容:

trans-unit.source: (empty)
{0} cache cleaned.
trans-unit.target: 已清除 {0} 缓存。

trans-unit.source: List files that are cached for each library
trans-unit.target: 列出为每个库缓存的文件

trans-unit.source: More than one library found with name "{0}"
trans-unit.target: 发现多个名为 "{0}" 的库

trans-unit.source: No libraries to update. Please use install command to install libraries
trans-unit.target: 没有要更新的库。请使用安装命令安装库

trans-unit.source: No library found with name "{0}" to update. Please specify a library name without the version information to update.
trans-unit.target: 找不到名为 "{0}" 库以进行更新。 请指定不含版本信息的库名以进行更新。

trans-unit.source: Failed to install library "{0}"
trans-unit.target: 安装库 "{0}" 失败

trans-unit.source: Lists the libraries cached for each provider.
trans-unit.target: 列出为每个提供程序缓存的库。

trans-unit.source: Provider "{0}" is not installed
trans-unit.target: 未安装提供程序 "{0}"

trans-unit.source: Similar libraries:
trans-unit.target: 类似的库:

trans-unit.source: Please fix the libman.json file and try again
trans-unit.target: 请修复 libman.json 文件, 然后重试

trans-unit.source: Select an option:
trans-unit.target: 选择一个选项:

trans-unit.source: The library "{0}" is already up to date
trans-unit.target: 库 "{0}" 已是最新版本

trans-unit.source: "{0}" is not a valid value for --to-version
trans-unit.target: "{0}" 不是 --to-version 的有效值

trans-unit.source: The version to update the library to (needs complete libraryid for the provider)
trans-unit.target: 要将库更新到的版本 (需要提供程序的完整 libraryid)

trans-unit.source: Installed library "{0}" to "{1}"
Uninstalled library "{0}"
trans-unit.target: 已卸载库 "{0}"

trans-unit.source: Library "{0}" does not contain the following files: {1}
trans-unit.target: 库 "{0}" 不包含以下文件: {1}

trans-unit.source: Library "{0}" cannot be installed. "{1}" is already installed at "{2}". Please specify a different destination.
trans-unit.target: 无法安装库 "{0}"。"{1}" 已安装在 "{2}" 上。 请指定其他目标。

trans-unit.source: LibraryId is required for update
trans-unit.target: 需要 LibraryId 才能更新

trans-unit.source: Please specify a different destination.
trans-unit.target: 请指定其他目标。

trans-unit.source: Failed to uninstall "{0}"
trans-unit.target: 未能卸载 "{0}"

trans-unit.source: Failed to update "{0}" to "{1}"
Failed to update "{0}" to latest
trans-unit.target: 未能将 "{0}" 更新到最新版本

trans-unit.source: Updated "{0}" to "{1}"
Could not determine the latest version for "{0}"
trans-unit.target: 无法确定 "{0}" 的最新版本

trans-unit.source: Failed to initialize libman.json. [{0}]: {1}
trans-unit.target: 无法初始化 libman. json。[{0}]: {1}

trans-unit.source: Cannot prompt for user input in this console.
trans-unit.target: 无法在此控制台中提示用户输入。

trans-unit.source: Please specify the complete library id and the also the provider using '--provider' option.
trans-unit.target: 请指定完整的库 ID，并使用 “--provider” 选项指定提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Please specify '{0}' using the '--{1}' option.
Gets or sets configuration settings
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置配置设置

trans-unit.source: libman config http_proxy libman config --set http_proxy=http://example libman config --setEncrypted http_proxy.password=passwordText
trans-unit.target: libman config http_proxy libman config --set http_proxy=http://example libman config --setEncrypted http_proxy.password=passwordText

trans-unit.source: Name of the setting to retrieve
trans-unit.target: 要检索的设置的名称

trans-unit.source: Key {0} not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到密钥 {0}

trans-unit.source: Cannot read and write settings in the same operation
trans-unit.target: 无法在同一操作中读取和写入设置

trans-unit.source: Sets a key-value pair in the configuration store. The option should be in the form key=value
trans-unit.target: 在配置存储区中设置键值对。 此选项应采用 "键=值" 格式

trans-unit.source: Sets a key with an encrypted value in the configuraiton store. The option should be in the form key=plaintext
trans-unit.target: 在配置存储区中设置具有加密值的键。 此选项应采用 "键=纯文本" 格式

trans-unit.source: Settings cannot be read and stored in the same operation. To remove a setting, set it to an empty string (--set key=). Retrieving decrypted values for encrypted settings is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 无法在同一操作中读取和保存设置。 要删除某个设置，请将其设置为空字符串(--set key=)。 不支持检索已加密设置的解密值。
